## ShortcutModifier type

Supported modifier keys, map to event's altKey, ctrlKey, shiftKey, metaKey.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ShortcutModifier = 'alt' | 'ctrl' | 'meta' | 'shift';
```
